entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dunchurch

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
